bibl.title: Phallus or Fleas at PBerol inv. 17202.31?
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 17202 [edd.: William BRASHEAR † and Roy KOTANSKY, A New Magical Formulary, Magic and Ritual in the Ancient World = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 141 (Leiden, 2002) pp. 3-24, 2 ill.], 31-33. Suggests in the light of Geoponica 13.15 that the original of the recipe had a spelling of cÊllai / cÊlloi / cÊllakew rather than of cvlÆ. <psullai, psulloi, psullakes, psole>
bibl.seg: JORDAN David, Phallus or Fleas at PBerol inv. 17202.31?
